name: Bloody Mice
description: It is time to annihilate those damn mice! Try to get more points and defeat your friends in the ranking. Do not let those rats proliferate and rule the world!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. Storage: 100 MB available space
